patthana15.83:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.83:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.83:2.1_1: Araṇaṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.83:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
